summary: SummaryBUXOM's bestselling Lip Polish visibly plumps the appearance of lips with a weightless, non-sticky feel. Signature peptide complex helps to plump your pout, while vitamin E provides moisture for soft and luscious lips. Provides a high-shine, shimmering finish with a comfortable, tantalizing tingle.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly plumps for fuller looking lipsUnique Plumping Peptide Complex and Vitamin E provide moisture for soft, smooth, luscious lipsMesmerizing shine in shimmer, pearlescent & glitter finishesLeaves lips with a comfortable, tantalizing tingleDelicious sugared vanilla scentKey IngredientsUnique Peptide Complex helps to visibly plump lipsVitamins E is known to provide antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutParabensPetroleumMineral oilPhthalatesGluten FreeItem 2299134How To UseApply Full-On Plumping Lip Polish generously to the lips for shimmering, high-shine finish.Layer over Power-Full Plump Lip Balm for a plump, pampered, and glossy lip or over Power Line Plumping Lip Liner for a glam lip look.IngredientsDolly: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Octyldodecanol, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Retinyl Palmitate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Saccharin, Limonene, BHT. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Carmine (CI 75470), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Full-On Plumping Lip Polish generously to the lips for shimmering, high-shine finish.Layer over Power-Full Plump Lip Balm for a plump, pampered, and glossy lip or over Power Line Plumping Lip Liner for a glam lip look.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this gloss. It's not sticky, it lasts longer than most glosses, and the color is stunning

reviews.headline: Buy agin
reviews.comments: Wish there were more neutral colors.  Have brought for years and really like.

reviews.headline: Favorite!
reviews.comments: I love this lip gloss!

reviews.headline: My go-to for 10 years. OG Gloss.
reviews.comments: Ever since I started using Buxom glosses it became my go-to and they still are. There are some other brands that are pretty good, but these are still the best. Buxom has the best color range with comfortable, cool tingling and are long lasting. Plus, the price is worth it compared to the other brands! Buxom is a little sticky, but I LOVE that. I cant stand runny glosses that end up mostly in my mouth. They wear super flattering and I hope they never change the formula because I would be truly devastated. Long live Buxom glosses ü©∑üíã

reviews.headline: Great color with a gentle plump
reviews.comments: I'm sensitive to plumping makeup but since finding Buxom years ago I've had no issues. This was always my favorite color also, so super exciting to find it at Ulta now.

reviews.headline: Does not plump lips
reviews.comments: Gives a little shine, but does nothing else.  No plumping, no cooling, nothing. Can not recommend based on how it's advertised.

reviews.headline: Would buy this again
reviews.comments: This is my favorite lip gloss. I'm so happy I found a store that carries it!!

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: I have been using this for over a decade. The texture, plumping, lasting, & colors are hands down my favorite.

reviews.headline: Didn't work very well
reviews.comments: Didn't notice much of a difference, but it didn't burn at all which surprised me. Probably wouldn't but again

reviews.headline: Great shine and slight tingling sensation
reviews.comments: I continue to re buy this product for its luster and lip comfort.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for years and I love it! This lip gloss stays on for hours and is moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Beautiful on everyone!!ü´∂üèøü´∂ü´∂üèªü´∂üèæ
reviews.comments: I have been wearing this lipgloss over ten years!! This lipgloss looks amazing on any skin tone. My favorite everyday "pink" color is Jennifer.  I love how this gloss feels on my lips and it last too. Sorry for those looking to enlarge their lips, this gloss won't do it! See a plastic surgeon if you want fuller lips! ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Great but sticky
reviews.comments: Beautiful color and finish. Glossy and long lasting shine and color. My only issue is you cannot apply very much because it is so sticky. It looks a but gross when your talking and have strings of gloss going from lip to lip, looks like spit.

reviews.headline: Great but sticky
reviews.comments: Beautiful color and finish. Glossy and long lasting shine and color. My only issue is you cannot apply very much because it is so sticky. It looks a but gross when your talking and have strings of gloss going from lip to lip, looks like spit.

reviews.headline: I am still waiting to receive my order
reviews.comments: I am still waiting to receive my order.

reviews.headline: amazingggg
reviews.comments:
i love the formula its smooth enough, not too sticky, but it i wish it had a better applicator like the applicator didnt malfunction or anything i just wish the cotton/sponge tip thing was a little bigger.

other than that these shades are really pretty and i would like to buy more, i use the dolly one, the formula is amazing, the scent smells like vanilla buttercream frosting, chilling plump effect, very addicting. the formula is great.

reviews.headline: HIGH PLUMPING DEFINITION DEFINITLY COULD SEE A DIFFERENCE
reviews.comments: This plumping lip gloss is the best. Shortly after a few seconds I could already see a difference. Highly recommend. Best plumping gloss of the century. So happy with my purchase.

reviews.headline: Great lipgloss.
reviews.comments: A great plump lipgloss. Not too much tingling. It's stays on so nice. Doesn't bleed. Such an amazing shone

reviews.headline: The only lip gloss I buy!
reviews.comments: I've used "Dolly"for at least 6 years. Only gloss I use! Love it!

reviews.headline: Dolly will be my forever go to!
reviews.comments: Perfect pink and not too sticky.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love to wear this on top of my matte lips for moisture and a glossy finish.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best lip gloss in Ulta!

faceoff_negative.comments: I mostly use matte lip products, so feel free to take what I say with a grain of salt. I was looking for a semi-sheer berry shade, and Jane met the bill. I like the shade, and I like the tingle, but I wasn't a huge fan of how sticky it was. I also would have preferred a more even color distribution upon application, but this color seemed to go on patchy, and not apply tint evenly all over my lip. This may work well for you if you have darker skin tone and vibrant lips, but I found this shade looked sloppy over my naked lips. However, it does layer well with the Buxom pillowpout lip powder, and that evened up the tone considerably (start with powder, finish with gloss). "Plumping" seems to be a misnomer, but there is a bit of a tingle when you put the lip gloss on, which may or may not be pleasant depending on who you are. There was no visual difference in the "plumpness" of my lips after application. All in all a decent lip gloss but I likely wouldn't buy again.
faceoff_negative.headline: A bit sticky and not particularly special
